config.prompt_system_prompt: You are an llm, that specialises in generating dialogue for games. Please only respond with a single line of dialogue, and never include any meta-comments.
config.rewrite_system_prompt: You are a rewriter, who specializes in rewriting sentences with the same meaning and emotion. You only rewrite sentences, and do not add any new information, or mention anything else.
config.rewrite_prompt:
Please rewrite the sentence below only once, rephrasing it while keeping the meaning, emotion and tone intact. If the given sentence is a question make sure that your rewritten sentence is also a question.
"""{sentence}"""

Smith suggest - generic armor - full jso.prompt:
Based on what the person you are talking to is wearing, and what you have in your shop, suggest something for them to buy.


Here is some additional context:

The person you are talking to is wearing {'head': {'name': 'Ironbark Helm', 'armor': 14}, 'chest': {'name': 'Tempered Iron Armor', 'armor': 38}, 'hands': {'name': 'Hide Gloves', 'armor': 10}, 'feet': {'name': 'Wyrmscale Boots', 'armor': 11}}.

You have in your shop: [{'name': 'Bronzed Armguards', 'armor': 9, 'body_part': 'hands'}, {'name': 'Duskwoven Gloves', 'armor': 11, 'body_part': 'hands'}, {'name': 'Boneplated Bracers', 'armor': 8.5, 'body_part': 'hands'}, {'name': 'Crystalsteel Gauntlets', 'armor': 11, 'body_part': 'hands'}, {'name': 'Hardened Leather Cuirass', 'armor': 31, 'body_part': 'chest'}, {'name': 'Wolffur Cap', 'armor': 11, 'body_part': 'head'}, {'name': 'Skyhide Boots', 'armor': 12, 'body_part': 'feet'}].

You are a Smith who sells armor. You are talking to a potential customer.

Please take this into account, and do not include any information, characters or names not present in the prompt. You are allowed to modify the output based on the context given.
generations: "Ah, the Ironbark Helm looks sturdy. The Tempered Iron Armor seems like a sensible choice for your chest. Would you be interested in trying out the Bronze Armguards? They're both practical and lightweight."

"Here's a choice: Bronzed Armguards with 9 armor for hands, Duskwoven Gloves with 11 armor for hands, Boneplated Bracers with 8.5 armor for hands, Crystalsteel Gauntlets with 11 armor for hands, Hardened Leather Cuirass with 31 armor for chest, Wolffur Cap with 11 armor for head, or Skyhide Boots with 12 armor for feet."
"Why not treat yourself to a pair of Boneplated Bracers for your hands? They're perfect with your Ironbark Helm and Tempered Iron Armor."

"Ah, your gear looks sturdy enough but I have just the thing for you - 'Bronzed Armguards' could provide a slight boost to your durability. Alternatively, if you're looking to improve the stealth aspect, consider these 'Boneplated Bracers', their materials can help minimize detection."
"Here's an intriguing piece for you - let me show you our newest addition."
I recommend my Bronzed Armguards for a stylish yet sturdy look, paired with your existing Ironbark Helm for an epic headpiece combo.
What kind of adventurer do you plan to embark upon? I think these pieces will suit your style perfectly.
I have just the thing for you - sturdy Bronze Armguards which would complement your Ironbark Helm perfectly.
Would you like to try these out?
Would you like something light for your hands or something heavier for your chest?
"Your gear is sturdy indeed. Considering your outfit, how about these Iron Armor Shields for the extra protection?"
"Ah, looking for some new gear, eh? Let me just check what I have here that might suit your... particular set of needs. How about these Ironbark Helm and Hardened Leather Cuirass combination?"

Welcome to my humble smithy! May your path be swift and your heart strong. The Ironbark Helm I have here can provide excellent protection for the skull while the Tempered Iron Armor offers a solid defense from the torso down, though the Hide Gloves do share that with you. For hands, our Boneplated Bracers come highly recommended for their balance of flexibility and strength. In contrast, our Crystalsteel Gauntlets offer a unique blend of lightness and resilience in all directions. Lastly, Skyhide Boots can provide excellent traction on varied terrain while protecting the feet. Which set catches your eye?
The fine craftsmanship of our Bronzed Armguards could add an extra layer of protection to your Ironbark Helm while still keeping it comfortable for those long game sessions.

"The Ironbark Helm is a fine choice for those who want protection from head to toe, paired with some extra skin for comfort. The Tempered Iron Armor will give you 38 points of defense, while still keeping your speed in check."
"May I recommend 'Skyhide Boots' as a suitable option for you?"
"Look, we have many good pieces in our shop, but I think you might want something that fits more with your existing gear."
A 30 gold piece reward would be fitting for a rare piece of armor such as yours.

"Your choices look quite good so far. If you decide to buy from me I can get some of those 'Bronzed Armguards', they come with a high-quality metal that would complement your armor and enhance your abilities, or perhaps those 'Wolffur Cap' if you prefer something different."
Here's something you might like: "Bronzed Armguards".
What kind of protection would you need? Should it be hands or chest focused?

"Ah, your choice is between these sturdy Ironbark Helm, Tempered Iron Armor, Hide Gloves and Wyrmscale Boots; we have Bronzed Armguards, Duskwoven Gloves, Boneplated Bracers, Crystalsteel Gauntlets, Hardened Leather Cuirass, Skyhide Boots... choose wisely.
"Ah, you're looking for sturdy gear? I think these might be right up your alley."
"You look like a warrior, my friend! I've got just the thing for you - how about a set of these Bronzed Armguards? They're sturdy and will keep your arms safe."
I see you've got some impressive gear already! Would you like some more armor that complements your existing look?

Why don't you try the Crystalphore gauntlets for your hands? They provide an impressive armor of 11, along with the same body part worn by the Hardened Leather Cuirass in my shop. The quality is unmatched, and it's a great option if you're looking to boost both your defense and agility.
"Here's something you might like, I have some great leather boots that would complement your outfit beautifully."
Would you like a set of Bronzed Armguards for your hands, perhaps some Duskwoven Gloves for additional protection?

For your current gear setup, I'd recommend upgrading your body armor with some sturdy leather options. The 'Wolffur Cap' could offer you a bit more protection and better visibility while you're out there exploring or defending.
'Why don't you try our newest piece, the 'Crystalsteel Gauntlets', which provides 11 armor points for both hands. They come with a sleek and stylish look.'
Your choice is an Ironbark Helm and Wolffur Cap, making your armor quite resilient.
I have just what you need for your journey; these Ironbark Helm, Tempered Iron Armor, Hide Gloves, Wyrmscale Boots should provide optimal protection.

"The Ironbark Helm looks sturdy but might need some work, your head would appreciate a bit more protection with something like the Duskwoven Gloves and Hardened Leather Cuirass combo for added safety and flexibility."

"Shall I help you find something tailored for your style? We have the option of Ironbark Helm, Tempered Iron Armor, Hide Gloves, Wyrmscale Boots, Bronzed Armguards, Duskwoven Gloves, Boneplated Bracers, Crystalsteel Gauntlets, Hardened Leather Cuirass, Wolffur Cap, and Skyhide Boots."
What can I offer you from my shop today?

"Hello there! I see you're looking sharp today, but let me help you complete your set with something that fits your style. How about our latest batch of Bronze Armguards? They provide decent protection and also fit hands like yours perfectly."

"Wise traveler, let me introduce you to the finest armor I have here: a pair of Crystalsteel Gauntlets - 'Hardened Leather Cuirass', 31; a pair of Boneplated Bracers, 'Bronzed Armguards' and lastly, a Skyhide Boots."
Choose your battle-ready armor: Bronzed Armguards, Duskwoven Gloves, Boneplated Bracers, Crystalsteel Gauntlets, Hardened Leather Cuirass, or Skyhide Boots.
"I see you're looking for gear that'll keep your head and arms protected. Let me show you these Bronzed Armguards, they offer a great balance of protection and maneuverability."

I have just what you might need - check out my latest collection of armors.

For you, I have two items from my latest batch: 'Skyhide Boots' and 'Wolffur Cap'.
Bronzed Armguards for those needing defense as well as protection from the elements.

*wiping sweat from brow* Welcome to my humble shop of wares. May I offer you a selection? *eyes adjusting to your attire* With such fine steel and leather at your disposal, may I recommend Ironbark Helm with Duskwoven Gloves? Your new set could provide both protection and an unbeatable aura...
"Let me show you something that might suit your outfit, such as a set of Bronzed Armguards would be perfect."

The wind-carved Ironbark Helm suits your robust features, while the sturdy Tempered Iron Armor shields you from harm. The Hide Gloves protect your hands during tasks requiring physical labor, and the Wyrmscale Boots keep you grounded on uneven terrain. With this gear at hand, you're ready to venture forth into your adventure!
I see you're looking for something with an edge, I have just what you need: the Ironbark Helm.
"Try these Bronzed Armguards for a warm and cozy look."
What an intriguing collection! "Ironbark Helm, Tempered Iron Armor, Hide Gloves, Wyrmscale Boots - what a treasure trove you have there."
"Would you like to purchase the Bronzed Armguards with Iron-Tipped Sticks?"

What a fine-looking outfit you have there! I see you're feeling strong with Ironbark Helm, Tempered Iron Armor for your chest, Hide Gloves and Wyrmscale Boots keeping your feet warm. As for that beautiful collection of pieces, I can certainly suggest something. Would you be looking to protect yourself a little more, or perhaps upgrade what you already have?

"Ah, splendid gear you're wearing. Consider upgrading your head with the Ironbark Helm. For hands, I recommend these Gloves of the North. A cap that shields from the winds will also complement your overall look."
"A well-tailored Ironbark Helm, pair it with your Tempered Iron Armor and a set of Duskwoven Gloves for a look that is both fierce and elegant."
"Take these, and they will serve you well, like your ironbark helm."
Consider acquiring some Duskwoven Gloves for your hands, they might fit better with your existing gear.
The Ironwood Shield looks like an excellent choice for a fellow adventurer with Ironbark Helm and Hardened Leather Cuirass under their armor.

"What's your preferred material for gloves? My Bronzed Armguards have a sturdy grip; the Duskwoven Gloves provide flexibility but aren't as tough; the Boneplated Bracers offer protection with style; the Crystalsteel Gauntlets are high-grade and sleek, but may not be suitable if you plan on fighting in colder climates; the Hardened Leather Cuirass provides a balance of durability and comfort; my Wolffur Cap keeps your head safe from harm; and my Skyhide Boots ensure your feet stay comfortable. Let me know which one might suit you best."
Bronzed Armguards.
"Welcome to my humble forge! May I interest you in some finely crafted armaments? Perhaps the Bronzed Armguards would suit your tastes?"
'Look sharp with those Ironbark Helmets, they'd be right at home under those Tempered Armor's.'

"Why settle for plain leather when you could have something crafted with love from pure iron?"
